mapper.delete: delete from show_sidemenu where menu_no=#{menu_no} and sidemenu_no=#{sidemenu_no}
mapper.select: select group_name, group_no, member_no, group_regdate from show_group where member_no = #{member_no} and group_ch='T'

select reservation_time,sum(order_price) as order_price from (select to_char(RESERVATION_TIME,'yyyy-mm') as reservation_time , ORDER_PRICE FROM SHOW_ORDER WHERE GROUP_NO=#{group_no} AND ORDER_REFUND='F' AND TO_char(to_date(#{reservation_time},'yyyymm'),'YYYYMM') = TO_char(reservation_time,'YYYYMM') and order_ch = 'T' and owner_ch=#{owner_ch}) group by reservation_time

select menu_name,sum(menu_count) menu_count,sum(menu_count)*sum(menu_price) menu_price from show_menu_check a, show_order b where a.order_no = b. order_no and TO_char(to_date(#{reservation_time},'yyyymmdd'),'YYYYMMdd') = TO_char(reservation_time,'YYYYMMdd') and b.group_no = #{group_no} and b.owner_ch=#{owner_ch} and order_ch = 'T' group by menu_name

select reservation_time,sum(order_price) as order_price from (select to_char(RESERVATION_TIME,'yyyy-mm') as reservation_time , ORDER_PRICE FROM SHOW_ORDER WHERE GROUP_NO=#{group_no} AND ORDER_REFUND='F' AND TO_char(to_date(#{reservation_time},'yyyy'),'YYYY') = TO_char(reservation_time,'YYYY') and order_ch = 'T' and owner_ch=#{owner_ch}) group by reservation_time

select menu_name,sum(menu_count) menu_count,sum(menu_count)*sum(menu_price) menu_price from show_menu_check a, show_order b where a.order_no = b. order_no and TO_char(to_date(#{reservation_time},'yyyymm'),'YYYYMM') = TO_char(reservation_time,'YYYYMM') and b.group_no = #{group_no} and b.owner_ch=#{owner_ch} and order_ch = 'T' group by menu_name
select group_name, group_no, member_no from show_group where member_no = #{member_no} and group_ch='T'
